mapper.select: SELECT * FROM taegi.user WHERE email=#{email} and password=#{password}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into user (no, email, nickname, password, name, age, gender, regdate, modifydate, birthday) values (#{no}, #{email}, #{nickname}, md5(#{password}), #{name}, #{age}, #{gender}, now(), null, #{birthday})
